subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: The trainer Woody Stephens, who died in 1998 after winning five consecutive Belmonts in the 1980s, still looms over the third leg of horse racing’s Triple Crown.
snippet: The trainer Woody Stephens, who died in 1998 after winning five consecutive Belmonts in the 1980s, still looms over the third leg of horse racing’s Triple Crown.
